summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 5387 for the improvement of Rainier Avenue, from Thayer Street to Ryan Street; by constructing wateramins and otherwise improving the same, under Ordinance No. 66413 as amended by Ordinance No. 66603, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
